sentence.Network_en: Well, we'll ship the bichromate in steel drums and the chromic anhydride in oil cans.
sentence.Network_cn: 嗯, 我们会把重铬酸盐用钢桶装,而无水铬酸则用油罐装.

sentence.Network_en: The oxidation of isosafrole is reaction with anhydride - acetone, anhydride - acetic acid, sodium bichromate - sulfuric acid and so on.

sentence.Network_en: Objective To observe the germicidal efficacy of compound potassium bichromate acid solution and its influencing factors.
